message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for $2000000.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $1500000. Would you be willing to negotiate closer to this amount?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget constraints. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $1750000. It's a fair compromise that still reflects the product's true value.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Considering the value I place on this product, I would like to propose an offer of $1600000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I still believe the product's value is worth more. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll offer you the product for $1650000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I hope it's acceptable to you.

Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually agreeable price. Based on my assessment of the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose an offer of $1625000. I hope this proposal is within your consideration.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence in finding a mutually agreeable price. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1700000. I'll offer you the product for $1675000. This is my final compromise, and I hope it's acceptable to you.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $1650000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while still respecting my budget constraints.

I understand that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll offer you the product for $1680000. This is my absolute final offer, and I hope it's acceptable to you.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I've carefully considered all our previous negotiations and discussions. Based on that, I would like to propose an offer of $1660000. I hope this final proposal is within your consideration and respects both our positions.
